title: AI-Enhanced Educational Leadership Strengthening Program for Social Sector Education

context.prior_knowledge: Higher education administration experience and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Social sector leadership education course focused on utilizing smartphone-based AI tools.

learning_goals: Participants can critically evaluate two or more social sector educational contents using AI-based analytical tools.
Participants can design learner-tailored feedback strategies by applying AI tools in smartphone environments.
Participants can identify three ethical issues that may arise in AI-supported personalized learning and propose mitigation strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
